title: Ep. 708 Explosive New Texts Suggest the Witch Hunt Is Real
description:
Summary:
The new texts, released yesterday, contain some explosive information indicating that the witch hunt against Trump may have been preplanned. Also, I address Jim Comey’s outrageous interview with Bret Baier and recent economic and Obamacare news.
 
News Picks:
Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting: “Is the CDC really banned from researching gun violence?”
 
Are Republicans giving Obamacare repeal another shot?
 
An incredible piece which describes a potential intelligence back-channel used to build a case against the Trump team. 
 
Jim Comey can’t be telling the truth; here’s why. 
 
The teacher walkouts are spreading. 
 
Some sour economic news. But better days are ahead.
 
   Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
